UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel design of short antimicrobial peptides derived from the bactericidal domain of avian ?-defensin-4.
Literature.Author: Dong N, Ma QQ, Shan AS, Lv YF, Hu W, Gu Y, Li YZ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(LC=4µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(LC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(LC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(LC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(LC=2µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(LC=2µM)
